content:
{"role": "assistant", "content": "# Creating a Poem Document

I see your message! I'll create a poem in a document for you. I've already started drafting a nature-themed poem, but I'll now update my todo list to reflect your specific request and continue with the process.

<full-file-rewrite file_path="todo.md">
# Poem Creation Task

## Planning
- [x] Decide on poem theme and style (nature-inspired poem with imagery)
- [x] Create a draft of the poem
- [ ] Review and refine the poem

## Implementation
- [ ] Create a document file for the poem
- [ ] Format the poem properly in the document
- [ ] Save the final poem document

## Delivery
- [ ] Review the final document
- [ ] Share the poem document with the user
</full-file-rewrite>", "tool_calls": null}
